name: 1Lookup
description: 1Lookup is the world's most accurate data verification platform built for SMBs. Validate phone numbers, emails, and IP addresses with enterprise-grade accuracy at 90% less cost than competitors. Features real-time fraud scoring, daily data updates, and simple API integration.
